lender.name: Chris
lender.occupational_info: I study the mathematics of finance: how financial instruments should be valued, and how portfolios should be managed to prevent heavy losses.

lender.name: Vannak
lender.loan_because: I know how hard the world can be.
lender.occupational_info: Surviving in a dog eat dog world without becoming one with God's help. The world should never be like this. I am in a world where there no friends. Those whom I have help, some have considered me an enemy and some actually showed some gratitude.

lender.name: Hanny
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world and have to start small.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I have so much.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: My work is interesting and complex. I am very fortunate in so many ways.

lender.name: Harold Lucero
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to help and share this blessing with others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Believe, Ask and it will be given to you.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I would like to see good, hard working people throughout the world be given an opportunity to earn a decent living to care for their family and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have invented new products---I advist them as to how to seek legal protection for their products and how to bring their products to market.

lender.name: Philip
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Lansing Community College. I take Graphic Arts and Web Design.

lender.name: Alan and Carol B.
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help others but allow them their dignity in the process - in Jesus' Name.
lender.occupational_info: Alan is from Australia and is self employed. Carol is from the USA and works for a large national company in the accounts receivable department.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Microlending seems like a smart idea. I come from an industry where we stretch one dollar into ten dollars. Maybe kiva will save the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I work as an employee in the oil and gas business, but I'd like to find a way to create an employee-owned cooperative in the same industry.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love to impower women.

lender.name: Bonita
lender.loan_because: Credit should be available to everyone. It is often the only way to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a small farm and grow organic vegetables, mainly parsnips.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student, looking to become a teacher.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to work to make things better for themselves and their families. I have started my own businesses several times so I know how hard that is.
lender.occupational_info: I do legal work for people and businesses who buy and sell land and buildings.

lender.name: marin
lender.loan_because: it seems like a reasonable way for one person, acting alone, to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design hospitals, schools, performing arts centres, high-rise residential buildings.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: The entrepreneurial spirit should be fostered, rewarded, and revered!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good standard of living. I want to help those that have less opportunity as I.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an elementary school. Half my day is running the library.

lender.name: Sivert
lender.loan_because: It is a way to reach out to people who haven't got the same opportunities as I have.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to do this, to help others, especially women, to achieve their dreams, to make their own living and to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Helping young students in need achieve their dreams of getting a college degree.

lender.name: DANIEL
lender.occupational_info: Iam a apastor and also aa abusinessman selling lab chemicals and stationery

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I hope to help other hard-working entrepreneurs grow personally and in business.
lender.occupational_info: I have 2 businesses. One is a larger, quality catering company and the other is a business planning consulting company.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit students to attend college by organizing events and campus visits.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: a little bit of money can go a long way!

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born in a land of great opportunity and a land of plenty and want others to enjoy those same blessings
lender.occupational_info: I manage cash for a large manufacturing firm that makes aluminum wheels for cars and trucks

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others!

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: When I moved back from Taiwan to Holland I couldn't bring many appliances with me because of the voltage differences. Instead of throwing them away, I decided to sell them, double the amount raised and put that in KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a software designer working in the micro chip industry (think about phones, mp3 players, game consoles, cars, laptops...).

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: In these current economic times where greed seems to be the motivating factor behind so many business decisions I am encouraged by the potential benefits that my relatively small loans can create.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying how to build, maintain and operate networks of roads and other forms of transportation.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: This is a new and interesting way to help less fortunate people in the world. I like being able to choose where my funds are being lent. I sincerely hope this is helping the recipients break their cycle of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small financial company. My job is to support all the computers in the office.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: helping others is good work.

lender.name: Louis and Yayoi
lender.loan_because: It helps the industrious gain the tools and capabilities to stenghen their communities allowing power and resources to be more equally distributed worldwide.

lender.name: Jim Middleton
lender.loan_because: I believe that acting globally is a way to connect us.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: 1 individual effort makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student!

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves and that is what the Arabs in the Middle East must do.

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: I believe it is one way that poverty can be alleviated.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Baylor University in Waco, TX. I am studying to be an accountant.

lender.name: Fiona, Evelyn & Gavin
lender.loan_because: It makes sense. Everyone deserves a chance to make their life better...not everyone has the opportunity. Kiva helps chance meet opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students who have difficulty learning. I love my job.

lender.name: Rory
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Save lives, raise the dead, snatch souls from the jaws of hell!

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Why not
lender.occupational_info: I buy houses, fix/finish them, and sell them for a profit

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: It's important to give those across the world a hands up.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: It is needed.

lender.name: BobbyO
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate and support causes that have a positive impact in the world. Especially ones that provide individuals the tools to improve their own lives. Lastly, because I love entrepreneurial endeavors and to be a small part in helping another to be able to pursue that and improve their lives is priceless!
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with a start-up to launch a brokerage service that connects English learners and tutors. It will allow students to know the quality of tutors and give tutors the option to earn extra income or to volunteer their services. In turn working to make English learning and services more accessible, affordable, and accountable.

lender.name: LEONARDO JESUS
lender.whereabouts: SAN MIGUEL REPUBLICA ARGENTINA, PCIA DE BS.AS.

lender.name: Bharat
lender.loan_because: A little money from America goes a long way in some parts of the world...because Kiva combines the best of idealism and basic humanity with the brilliance of MFI to make a great impact on people's lives all over the world...Long live social entrepreneurship!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, a tutor, a researcher and soon to be graduate student. What little money I have I spend on survival, but I am about to save more to spend on Kiva...

lender.name: janice
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful gift of hope.
lender.occupational_info: High School Wellness Education Administrator (Health and Physical Education)

lender.name: Bernhard
lender.loan_because:
I loan primarily to loan groups with people who have independent purposes for their loans, not just a single business, offer a group guarantee, and live in countries that are below HDI (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_Development_Index) 150. I may make exceptions to this rule.
The reason why I loan is that the categorical imperative (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Categorical_imperative) demands that you cannot rely on the government alone to support people in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I write books and articles for the Wikimedia Foundation, which are then made available for free. (For example http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Parent_Education_Course_Writer's_Guide)

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Myra
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Marco Antonio
lender.loan_because: It¬¥s important to give something back, to involve more with the world around us
lender.occupational_info: Election bureau in Mexico, also poetry selections

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been inspired by my dad, Gene Dunlap, to take a look around and share the wealth. My dad always encouraged me to pay attention to the positive and move past the negative. I hope to set an example that will encourage others to think positively and to believe in their own strength as my dad did for me.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel grateful to be able to share my resources with others in a way that contributes to a better world.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been given much.

lender.name: Mot
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to help others...and that makes me happy. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in helping health care companies obtain and implement state contracts to manage the care of the poorest people in the US.

lender.name: Glenn & Victoria
lender.loan_because: We, by virtue of being born in the USA have been given so much, that it is not only fair, but a moral obligation to help where we can.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people help themself to be come self sufficient,productive,and build stable lives and communities.

lender.name: Montero
lender.loan_because: thanks to the Engelstein family, especially Sydney, and because helping women thrive economically in developing countries is one of the best ways to change the world for good.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my career...it is nice to give back....
lender.occupational_info: I make bronze sculptures of horses...

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I mother five children.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: As a Christian, I am called to serve others. I believe Kiva's approach is a great one because it focuses on those who have shown they are willing to work for their living rather than just asking for a handout, and it allows a single donation to keep helping new people indefinitely.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for a technology company that makes tools which help all sorts of companies develop new products in many industries, including medical, scientific and industrial.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I am helping a specific person and that I can afford to give an amount that will really make a difference to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in home health, taking care of patients with a variety of health situations. I love the one-on-one care.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: Student at UC Berkeley, California

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the philosophy of giving a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I see myself involved in improving health, by working with people to live pain free!

lender.name: Sara
lender.occupation: Production department of a theatre company
lender.loan_because: I know I can't change everything, but this way I can make a difference to someone, and that matters.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of teachers.

lender.name: Jacquie and Lloyd
lender.loan_because: there should be no boundaries - geographic or otherwise - to opportunity.

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.loan_because: I believe a little push can create big results

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of free enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their problems.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: Because I can help a little

lender.name: helen
lender.loan_because: the act of sharing makes the world a better place and helps people take control of their lives.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to help women across the world to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Looking after corporate systems in safety and incident management

lender.name: Juliana
lender.loan_because: My parents are immigrants from Cambodia and they inspire me to do good!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at UC Berkeley and will graduate in May 2009. Though my career interests are in marketing, I will always have a desire to help others. I have been interested in Cambodia my whole life and have been doing undergraduate research about development there.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: it's an investment that can change a life!

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I like to suppport the principles of microfinance. "Pass it around" and give someone a big smile!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a High School Office helping pupils, staff, teachers and parents.

lender.name: Syozo
lender.loan_because: i am interesting to peple in this site.

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: I would like to teach/enable a man how to fish

lender.name: Shan
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to be able to expand your business if only you had enough money. I understand how difficult it can be to get a loan, particularly if you happen to be an older woman, so would like to help out when I can.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves finding people to help older people and young people with disabilities stay as independent as possible.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone, in his life, has the right to TRY

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It's the best way to help people help themselves, at least from across the world!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to design small robots.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.occupation: research analyst for UK department of plant & Soil

lender.name: Meera
lender.loan_because: We are all creations of God with beauty in us, and we are equal. It's not fair that some people can't get loans because of where they live, and microcredit is a great way of helping to live out the fact that we are all of equal worth.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to follow Jesus, and am a nurse by profession. I try to receive God's Kingdom on earth, and sharing wealth is one way of doing that.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I love.
lender.occupational_info: I love, support, encourage and walk alongside youth as they grow in their faith.

lender.name: Catharine
lender.loan_because: Helping someone to help themself is much more satisfying than a check to an anonymous organization
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick folks--mostly seniors and write poems when I can

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: My Soul is prompting me to do this...

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I would like to help families throughout the world enhance their quality of life and help fund better education for the children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a married mother of three boys. We are involved in agriculture, raising cattle. The boys help my husband and I with the family ranch. I am also employed as a middle school and high school science and math teacher. My day begins well before the sun comes up doing chores and milking my cow. I then set out for school which is 45 minutes away. I enjoy teaching through the day and return home in the evening to milk once again. Weekends are very busy working on the ranch taking care of the cattle ensuring that all their needs are met.

lender.name: for my sister
lender.loan_because: We are all connected to each other.

lender.name: Sydney Alexander
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I am able to impact someone's life in a positive way. Each of us can make this world a better place; one investment at a time!
lender.occupational_info: I am an eigth grade student. I have studied Spanish for the last 8 years. My passion is helping women and children in Spanish speaking counties.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I feel that this type of program can really make a difference to people's lives.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: We live in a world where you can get killed by a random stranger for 1 dollar. We live in a world where a random stranger can help out a man in need, too.

lender.name: Mats
lender.loan_because: A loan give the receiver a greater sense of pride and accomplishment than a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of sustainability for a global corporation and try to minimize the environmental impact of our products and services.

lender.name: Lisa J
lender.loan_because: I want to be the change I want to see in the world.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Fixing broken bones of cats and dogs.

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: i want to help
lender.occupational_info: i am studying business

lender.name: Brad and Haze
lender.loan_because: as a church we are committed to playing our part in serving the poorest and most persecuted people from around the world.
lender.occupational_info: lovely wife - Haze... 2 boys - Barny and Isaac... My work: running a smallish business.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I would like to help make a little difference

lender.name: TJay
lender.loan_because: KIVA makes it so easy to let us bridge the gap between the poverty cycle and empowering personal development.

lender.name: Ariel
lender.loan_because: we gotta invest in each other!
lender.occupational_info: I study history because I want to be able to teach young people about the past.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I am not a wealthy person. After I pay my bills my wife and I must be careful with the money we have left. Before Kiva, I believed we could loan a little, if it would help, but I didn't think our few dollars would be of use to anyone. We felt powerless to change the world, in any way. Kiva has given me hope that the efforts of even a few people, pooling our little capital does can change the world. I pray that the pooled pennies of an ever growing community of lenders will empower our clients. I pray our borrowers will prosper and become lenders so that their neighbors also may succeed. I loan because I am a crazy optomist who prays the pennies Kiva members suffer to share in loans sends a powerful message to everyone. The world can be a big dangerous place with lots of hate, prejudice, greed and wars. I hope the message people get is your best bet when you need a friend is the person, or organization that treated you like a friend, even though you were a stranger.
lender.occupational_info: Disabled

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to make an impact on those who are less fortunate than myself, who are actively trying to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach small children math, reading, writing, science, and social studies.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: our family enjoys supporting people to start their own business and achieve their family dreams
lender.occupational_info: my company develops software that helps engineers all over the world design their dreams.

lender.name: Siri
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: Going to school everyday...

lender.name: lisa
lender.occupational_info: I adminstrate programs for adult trainees in electrical supply design.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of opportunity.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want people to have a chance to pursue interests that they might not have the start-up money for.

lender.name: Shira
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others and making the world a better place!

lender.name: Ann S
lender.occupation: woman of many talents but little training ;-)

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: If those who can help don't, who will?

lender.name: Vandana
lender.loan_because: it's a pleasure to give
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician - a hematologist-oncologist

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: My brother and his girlfriend turned me onto it. I really like the idea, when people come together good things can happen.
lender.occupational_info: I manufacture a medical device product used around the world.

lender.name: Shawn & Liam
lender.loan_because: There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always attained by giving them to someone else. -Peyton Conway March
lender.occupational_info: We work with children and adults with Autism and varying developmental disabilities. 'In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love. '

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe that we're all related.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in conflict to talk with each other to solve their disputes so that they both are satisfied.

lender.name: Chico and Monty
lender.loan_because: It's a dog-eat-dog world out there...we gladly throw some of our bones around the world to help people get a leg up!
lender.occupational_info: Chico commands the world from a high perch, while Monty fetches thrown objects and licks baby toes.

lender.name: Tuan
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give." - Sir Winston Churchill

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: it gives me great pleasure to help others- especially those who have so little.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer near the city of Boston.

lender.name: Lawrence Lo
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the backbone of every country. They contribute to the economy and well-being of the people.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers do interesting things

lender.name: P√•l
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John & Leslie
lender.loan_because: Leslie and I loan because Kiva is an easy way to make the world work better for very specific, very real people.
lender.occupational_info: Leslie develops new business for a large company in New York. I design logos and web sites for small companies.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed in my life; I want to help those who want to help themselves, and feel that KIVA is the way to go.

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: Standing around in a beer factory

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who haven't had the advantages that I have had in my life. Helping others is always a good thing to do, ALWAYS! The blessings are always returned.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired. I took care of my elderly parents for the past 5 years, they have since passed away.

lender.name: Med Welch
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of teaching people to fish and thus take care of themselves instead of giving them a fish every day and making them dependent. Kiva is that idea in Spades!
lender.occupational_info: I sell Amish-made furniture to pay the bills and I design doll clothes and make patterns of them to fit American Girl dolls to feed my soul. I sell the patterns on line. Too fun!

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to empower others to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I make fancy-pants jewelry without the fancy-pants price tag.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I understand.

lender.name: carole
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women in developing countries.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: Karma
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a geological engineer.

lender.name: Santiago
lender.loan_because: I believe in Micro-credit
lender.occupational_info: I study in the University of Notre Dame

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: everyone should have access to affordable capital so they can achieve their goals and financially support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Scootch
lender.loan_because: It must be done!

lender.name: Amanda & Karen
lender.loan_because: From each according to his ability, to each according to his need. We can't loan much, so we loan what we can. It's easy, and it's a great way to make a small difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info:
I (Amanda) am studying architecture in graduate school. I want to build better buildings and better cities that will have the lasting ability to improve the quality of people's lives.
I (Karen) am a librarian. I love helping people get access to information. I'm also a gardener, and I'm currently really looking forward to our summer crop of tomatoes.

lender.name: Militsa
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think micro loans will help people of the world. Peace!
lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 so although I dance I also go to school and do chores and mom makes me do homework. Pretty normal life for American peoples. Rock on.

lender.name: Melissa Barling
lender.loan_because: it has an extraordinary impact on others. It's life changing.
lender.occupational_info: My name is Melissa, I live in Sonoma, California, and I'm 13 years of age. I go an amazing youth group ran by John Casciani and looking foward to helping others through kiva.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I know that I can not help everyone in this world who needs it, but I believe that we are obligated to help when it is in our power to do so, and I can do this.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: All people are my family
lender.occupational_info: I write magazine articles and books on travel and sailing. Before I retired I taught adults how to operate a small business.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: activism is fun.

lender.name: Shawnie
lender.loan_because:
My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my B-day, and I have to say, I have a very smart son & he knows me well.
I feel that loaning is an effective and dignified way to help hard-working people develop the resources that will enable them to transform their lives and their communities - and that is a wonderful thing to be part of. What can I say? I have a very smart son!

lender.name: Wade
lender.loan_because: I believe in people willing to take on the risks and responsibilities of entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: internet retail sales

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a difference!

lender.name: Sarah and Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe I should teach my children to love, not to judge.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher of computers for other business owners

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: deckhand on a yacht

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I attend a Seventh-day Adventist Christian College.

lender.name: Uttam
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Abraham

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: I think we can make a difference by helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I have the means to help and I consider it an honour and a privilege to help others.

lender.name: isa
lender.loan_because: i wanne helps people
lender.occupational_info: i'm a freelance writer who works at home. I do my job that book publisher order to me. I also have small business in publishing service that serve on book editing, writing, illustration, layout etc. Thus, for supporting my early business.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: We too understand how tough it is to get loans for great business ideas and this is an excellecnt way for me to provide assistance to those who will do the best with it. I pray that you will be successful.

lender.name: amare
lender.occupational_info: I am a social entrepreneur graduated in Food technology and working on Food value chain. who is look for loan to launch Food value chain program that benefit food grower farmers.

lender.name: First Plymouth UCC
lender.loan_because: The mission of the Ministry of Christian Outreach is to engage the members and friends of First Plymouth in endeavors that promote and support human dignity and social, economic, and environmental justice.
lender.occupational_info: First Plymouth Congregational Church is home to thoughtful and progressive Christians. We offer a creative, diverse, and welcoming environment that supports all individuals and families.

lender.name: Fajar
lender.loan_because: I need To Build Cellular and Computer Bussines.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: eh, time to do some good.
lender.occupational_info: I am partners in a company that buys, sells and repairs telephone equipment.

lender.name: Naveed
lender.loan_because: I am greatly inspired by Muhammad Yunus . They call him the "banker of the poor." the Bangladeshi economist who pioneered a new category of banking known as micro-credit, which grants small loans to poor people who have no collateral and who do not qualify for conventional bank loans."No one is more motivated than the poor to get out of poverty"
lender.occupational_info: In any situation the greatest good you can do is your best. I believe that when you know you are doing your best, regardless of what happens to you that is beyond your control, you will be able to retain a pervasive sense of inner peace. You can ask for nothing more than to be doing your very best at this particular moment in time. If you have that, you want for nothing. And if you want for nothing, the natural consequence is peace.

lender.name: Mary-Anne
lender.loan_because: It is so easy for me to make a difference to someone who really needs the help. And it is exciting.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes, and I also help with their Wills and estates.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: "Give a person a fish, they eat for a day, teach them how to fish, they eat for a lifetime." I would like to empower people to eat for a lifetime.

lender.name: Bryony
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit, helping people

lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs so that people using the internet can get information from databases.

lender.loan_because: As a small business owner, I know how hard it is to get your footing in the developed world -- and I realize how much harder it is for someone in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a university student learning about educating children who are deaf or hard of hearing. With my own business, I make jewelry, eco-friendly tea bags, and things to help people relax.
